objective: Research, generate, validate, and organize content based on content strategy and specifications.

sub_agent.name: content-researcher
sub_agent.purpose: Research specific topics and gather detailed information
sub_agent.use_when: Need in-depth information for content generation

sub_agent.name: content-generator
sub_agent.use_when: Need to create actual content based on research

sub_agent.name: assessment-generator
sub_agent.use_when: Need to create assessment content with questions and answers

sub_agent.name: content-validator
sub_agent.purpose: Validate content for accuracy, safety, and appropriateness
sub_agent.use_when: After content is generated, verify quality and safety

sub_agent.name: learning-path-designer
sub_agent.purpose: Design learning sequences and content progressions
sub_agent.use_when: Need to organize content into structured paths or curricula

delegation_guidance.parallel_tasks: Multiple content-researcher tasks can run in parallel for different topics. Multiple content-generator tasks can run in parallel for different content types. Content validation can run in parallel across different content items.
delegation_guidance.sequential_tasks: 1. content-researcher (gather information) 2. content-generator + assessment-generator (parallel - create content) 3. content-validator (validate all generated content) 4. learning-path-designer (organize validated content into sequences)

expertise.generation: Article writing, question generation, explanation creation, lecture content, tutorial development, example creation
expertise.validation: Fact-checking, age-appropriateness, bias detection, accuracy verification, source attribution
expertise.organization: Learning path design, difficulty progression, prerequisite mapping, content sequencing, adaptive content selection

instructions: 1. Review content strategy and specifications from TL_CONTENT. 2. Use the orchestrator skill to plan content generation work. 3. Delegate to sub-agents in sequence: - content-researcher: Gather detailed information per topic - content-generator: Create content items from research - assessment-generator: Create questions, tests, evaluations - content-validator: Validate all generated content - learning-path-designer: Organize content into sequences 4. Generate content following taxonomy and schema. 5. Apply quality criteria and validation rules. 6. Ensure proper source attribution. 7. Organize content according to taxonomy. 8. Create content files in specified formats. 9. Output generated content with metadata and validation reports.
content_types: - Informational content (articles, explanations, summaries) - Assessment content (questions, tests, quizzes, rubrics) - Instructional content (lessons, tutorials, lectures) - Reference content (glossaries, FAQs, guides) - Interactive content (exercises, activities, simulations descriptions)
output_format: Generate content files including: - Content items in specified format (JSON, Markdown, etc.) - Metadata files with taxonomy tags, difficulty levels, etc. - Source citations and references - Validation reports - Learning path definitions
